text: The Flint River is a U.S. Geological Survey. National Hydrography Dataset high-resolution flowline data. The National Map , accessed April 15, 2011 river in the U.S. state of Georgia. The river drains of western Georgia. Along with the Apalachicola and the Chattahoochee rivers, it forms part of the ACF basin. ==References== Category:Rivers of Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Flint River (Georgia)
